long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help you to block annoying support chats and their pop-ups.

Motivation:
While I surfing on the internet and checking sites, I do not want to see pop-up windows that appear on my screen, without pressing a button.
It is so annoying.
If I need help on the site, I would go to the contact page and ask for help. Otherwise, don't bother me with your shi-t.

This is a beta version, supported next providers:
   Intercom
   Drift
   Helpcrunch
   Reamazejs

I will add more if you like it.
If you have any questions or if you found a bug  - find me on twitter - @Neokusp
